name: FuseCell
description:
When you have nothing to lose, you risk everything.

Fuse Cell was made in 3 days for the Ludum Dare Jam Competition. Rate it at: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/39/fuse-cell

How to play:

  • Cursor keys: move. Keeping Z or X pressed slows you down which is handy for hard maneuvers
  • Z: shoot. Shooting consumes energy
  • X:  Whenever you're low on energy, your ship is equipped with a fusion device. Whenever you're near a flying small enemy, you can attempt to absorb it by pressing X. Holding X and releasing when the Charge meter is right on the small yellow area, allows you to recharge. 2 consecutive MAX Energy recharges, result in a mega bomb.
